Experience.Title: Frontend Engineer
Experience.Description: Developed and maintained frontend applications using React and Redux. Collaborated with backend engineers to design and implement RESTful APIs. Conducted code reviews and provided feedback to team members.
Highlights: Developed and maintained frontend applications using React and Redux.
Collaborated with backend engineers to design and implement RESTful APIs.
Conducted code reviews and provided feedback to team members.

Experience.Title: Software Engineer
Experience.Description: Designed and implemented RESTful APIs using Node.js and Express. Developed frontend applications using React and Redux. Wrote unit and integration tests to ensure code quality and reliability.
Highlights: Designed and implemented RESTful APIs using Node.js and Express.
Developed frontend applications using React and Redux.
Wrote unit and integration tests to ensure code quality and reliability.

Projects.Title: Project A
Projects.Description: Developed a web application that allows users to create and share recipes. Implemented user authentication and authorization using JWT tokens. Designed and implemented a RESTful API using Node.js and Express.
Highlights: Developed a web application that allows users to create and share recipes.
Implemented user authentication and authorization using JWT tokens.
Designed and implemented a RESTful API using Node.js and Express.

Projects.Title: Project B
Projects.Description: Developed a web application that allows users to search for and save recipes. Integrated with a third-party API to retrieve recipe data. Implemented user authentication and authorization using Firebase Authentication.
Highlights: Developed a web application that allows users to search for and save recipes.
Integrated with a third-party API to retrieve recipe data.
Implemented user authentication and authorization using Firebase Authentication.
